summary:
## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media
features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use
of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may
combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve
collected from your use of their services.

Do not sell or share my personal information

Deny Allow all Show details

OK

Deny Allow selection Allow all

Necessary

Preferences

Statistics

Marketing

Show details

Cookie declaration [#IABV2SETTINGS#] About

Necessary (20) Preferences (1) Statistics (18) Marketing (17) Unclassified (2)

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like
page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot
function properly without these cookies.

Name| Provider| Purpose| Expiry| Type  
---|---|---|---|---  
ASP.NET_SessionId [x2]| Kliken  
SiteWit| Preserves the visitor's session state across page requests.| Session|
HTTP  
AWSALB [x2]| Kliken  
SiteWit| Registers which server-cluster is serving the visitor. This is used
in context with load balancing, in order to optimize user experience. | 7
days| HTTP  
AWSALBCORS [x2]| Kliken  
SiteWit| Registers which server-cluster is serving the visitor. This is used
in context with load balancing, in order to optimize user experience. | 7
days| HTTP  
laravel_session| Poptin| This cookie is used internally by the website’s
owners, when uploading or renewing website content.| 1 day| HTTP  
XSRF-TOKEN| Poptin| Ensures visitor browsing-security by preventing cross-site
request forgery. This cookie is essential for the security of the website and
visitor. | 1 day| HTTP  
__eca_s_id_| Ecwid| Necessary for the shopping cart functionality on the
website.| Persistent| HTML  
__eca_v_id_| Ecwid| Necessary for the shopping cart functionality on the
website.| Persistent| HTML  
rc::a| Google| This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots.
This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use
of their website.| Persistent| HTML  
rc::b| Google| This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. |
Session| HTML  
rc::c| Google| This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. |
Session| HTML  
pa_enabled| Solarwinds| Determines the device used to access the website. This
allows the website to be formatted accordingly. | Persistent| HTML  
sto-id-editor| Weebly| Preserves users states across page requests.| Session|
HTTP  
_GRECAPTCHA| Google| This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and
bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on
the use of their website.| 180 days| HTTP  
CookieConsent| Cookiebot| Stores the user's cookie consent state for the
current domain| 1 year| HTTP  
is_mobile| www.thethirstyfilly.com| This cookie is used to determine which
type of device the visitor is using, so the website can be properly
formatted.| Session| HTTP  
language [x2]| www.thethirstyfilly.com  
Weebly| Saves the user's preferred language on the website.| 14 days| HTTP  
  
Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the
way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region
that you are in.

Name| Provider| Purpose| Expiry| Type  
---|---|---|---|---  
a/n (40)| Poptin| Detects how many times a user has visited the website in
order to determine whether an on-page notification should be displayed.| 1
day| HTTP  
  
Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with
websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

Name| Provider| Purpose| Expiry| Type  
---|---|---|---|---  
_swa_u| Kliken| Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website.
Used for internal analytics by the website operator. | Persistent| HTML  
images/cq_blank.gif| Kliken| Registers data on visitors' website-behaviour.
This is used for internal analysis and website optimization. | Session| Pixel  
_ga [x2]| Google| Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical
data on how the visitor uses the website.| 2 years| HTTP  
_gid [x2]| Google| Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical
data on how the visitor uses the website.| 1 day| HTTP  
snowplowOutQueue_#_post2| cdn2.editmysite.com| Registers statistical data on
users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website
operator. | Persistent| HTML  
_sp_root_domain_test_# [x2]| cdn2.editmysite.com| Pending| Session| HTTP  
sp| Square| Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website.
Used for internal analytics by the website operator. | 1 year| HTTP  
pa| Solarwinds| Registers the website's speed and performance. This function
can be used in context with statistics and load-balancing.| Persistent| HTML  
_ZB_ADMIN_LAST_URL_| Zotabox| Determines when the visitor last visited the
different subpages on the website, as well as sets a timestamp for when the
session started.| Session| HTML  
_ZB_ADMIN_TIME_STAMP_| Zotabox| Determines when the visitor last visited the
different subpages on the website, as well as sets a timestamp for when the
session started.| Session| HTML  
_ZB_STATS_VISIT| Zotabox| This cookie is used to determine when the visitor
last visited the different subpages on the website.| Session| HTML  
_ZB_STATS_VISIT_#| Zotabox| Pending| Session| HTML  
_snow_id.#| cdn2.editmysite.com| Used by Snowplow Analytics to track how users
are browsing and engaging with a website.| 2 years| HTTP  
_snow_ses.#| cdn2.editmysite.com| Used by Snowplow Analytics to track how
users are browsing and engaging with a website.| 1 day| HTTP  
_swa_u| Kliken| Registers data on visitors' website-behaviour. This is used
for internal analysis and website optimization. | 1000 days| HTTP  
  
Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is
to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and
thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

Name| Provider| Purpose| Expiry| Type  
---|---|---|---|---  
mp_#_mixpanel [x4]| Google  
public.honeybook.com| Pending| 1 year| HTTP  
poptin_client_id| Poptin| Used in context with pop-up advertisement-content on
the website. The cookie determines which ads the visitor should be shown, as
well as ensuring that the same ads does not get shown more than intended.|
Session| HTML  
poptin_every_visit_session| Poptin| Implements pop-up advertisement on the
website. | Session| HTML  
poptin_new_user| Poptin| Implements pop-up advertisement on the website. |
Session| HTML  
poptin_origin_landing_page| Poptin| Implements pop-up advertisement on the
website. | Session| HTML  
PSecwid__utm__storagePSutm__data__history| Ecwid| This cookie may collect the
following information and store it against a user ID: Product codes from
merchant sites the visitor has browsed and other information relevant to
shopping behaviour on mainstream shopping sites. This information is used to
serve targeted adverts to the visitor.| Persistent| HTML  
PSecwid__utm__storagePSutm__data__history_expire| Ecwid| Contains the expiry-
date for the cookie with corresponding name. | Persistent| HTML  
__mpq_#_#| public.honeybook.com| Collects data on user behaviour and
interaction in order to optimize the website and make advertisement on the
website more relevant. | Persistent| HTML  
i/jot/embeds| Twitter Inc.| Sets a unique ID for the visitor, that allows
third party advertisers to target the visitor with relevant advertisement.
This pairing service is provided by third party advertisement hubs, which
facilitates real-time bidding for advertisers.| Session| Pixel  
poptin_c_visitor| Poptin| Used in context with pop-up advertisement-content on
the website. The cookie determines which ads the visitor should be shown, as
well as ensuring that the same ads does not get shown more than intended.| 30
days| HTTP  
poptin_old_user| Poptin| Used in context with pop-up advertisement-content on
the website. The cookie determines which ads the visitor should be shown, as
well as ensuring that the same ads does not get shown more than intended.| 2
days| HTTP  
poptin_session| Poptin| Implements pop-up advertisement on the website. | 1
day| HTTP  
poptin_user_id| Poptin| Used in context with pop-up advertisement-content on
the website. The cookie determines which ads the visitor should be shown, as
well as ensuring that the same ads does not get shown more than intended.| 1
year| HTTP  
poptin_user_ip| Poptin| Sets a unique ID for a specific visitor. This ID can
be used to recognize the visitor upon re-entry and implement any preference
choices made. The cookie also allows the website to track the visitor on
multiple websites for marketing purposes. | 1 year| HTTP  
  
Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying,
together with the providers of individual cookies.

Name| Provider| Purpose| Expiry| Type  
---|---|---|---|---  
__mp_opt_in_out_865a793f9d17ecb3b7f20afefe07e4bd| public.honeybook.com|
Pending| Session| HTTP  
segments| www.honeybook.com| Pending| Session| HTTP  
  
[#IABV2_LABEL_PURPOSES#] [#IABV2_LABEL_FEATURES#] [#IABV2_LABEL_PARTNERS#]

[#IABV2_BODY_PURPOSES#]

[#IABV2_BODY_FEATURES#]

[#IABV2_BODY_PARTNERS#]

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's
experience more efficient.  
  
The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly
necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we
need your permission.  
  
This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third
party services that appear on our pages.  
  
You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie
Declaration on our website.  
  
Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process
personal data in our Privacy Policy.  
  
Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your
consent.

Cookie declaration last updated on 5/8/23 by Cookiebot

  * Home

  * Our Bars 
  * Frequent Questions

  * Cigar Lounge 
  * Friendors

  * Blog 

* * *

_Weddings -  Rehearsal Dinners - Graduations - _ _Corporate Events - Public
Events & More.._

* * *

## We include the following in all bookings!

* * *

  
Cocktail Tasting: Between Jan - April we will meet to sample cocktails and
plan your unique menu.  
Bartenders: insured, passionate, and licensed bartenders will take the floor
when crafting cocktails for your event  
Supplies: includes cups for each cocktail or drink, straws, napkins, picks,
garnishes, and an abundance of ice  
Decor & More: We provide all decor pictured in our photos. This includes menu
boards, and fixtures (barrels & dressers)  
 Ingredients : you name it- fresh fruits, herbs, spices, bitters, hand crafted
mixers, infusions, and various add- ons  
Basic Mixers: (Coke, Diet Coke, Tonic, Soda, Cranberry, Juice)  
Soft Drinks & Water: Coke, Diet, Sprite, Ginger Ale / self serve water
decanters  
Alcohol ordering and delivery: We will place your alcohol order and have it
delivered prior to your event.  
Setup and tear down: We show up really early and leave late. We'll never leave
until our chores are done.​  
As environmental conscious business owners we only use napkins, straws and
picks that will decompose in our landfills.

* * *

## Estimated Pricing:

Figures below are strictly for service, staff and supplies.  
​ **Alcohol is sold  separately from our preferred vendor!**

|

|

Events Starting at 150 guest  (estimate)  
  
---  
  
2900  
  
Packages starting at  
  
Thirsty Filly Mobile Bar: ​Your choice of mobile bar based on availability​  
  
5 hours of service:  We arrive on location 2-3 hours prior to your event and
serve tasty cocktails for 5 hours starting at cocktail hour. (add on hours
available)  
  
Wine and Beer service:  Multiple draft beer taps, can or bottled beer, red and
white wine  
  
Three Signature Craft Cocktails: Our bartenders will mix up your three
favorite cocktails for your guest all night. We have a list of custom
cocktails to choose from.  
  
​Full Service Open Bar:  Choose what additional liquors you would like behind
the bar. We always provide your standard washes and mixers outside of your
craft cocktails to make most drinks. Many clients select to have Titos, Jack
Daniels, Gin etc...  
  
​Alcohol ordering:  We make this process very easy! Although alcohol is not
included in our pricing, we will plan your order, place your order and even
have it delivered. Leftovers after your event? No problem, we can return beer
and wine for a credit.  
  
Click here to get in touch!  
  
* * *

|

|

Events around 100 guest or less (estimate)  
  
---  
  
2200  
  
Packages starting at  
  
Thirsty Filly Mobile Bar: ​Your choice of mobile bar based on availability​  
  
5 hours of service:  We arrive on location 2-3 hours prior to your event and
serve tasty cocktails for 5 hours starting at cocktail hour. (add on hours
available)  
  
Wine and Beer service:  Multiple draft beer taps, can or bottled beer, red and
white wine  
  
Three Signature Craft Cocktails: Our bartenders will mix up your three
favorite cocktails for your guest all night. We have a list of custom
cocktails to choose from.  
  
​Full Service Open Bar:  Choose what additional liquors you would like behind
the bar. We always provide your standard washes and mixers outside of your
craft cocktails to make most drinks. Many clients select to have Titos, Jack
Daniels, Gin etc...  
  
​Alcohol ordering:  We make this process very easy! Although alcohol is not
included in our pricing, we will plan your order, place your order and even
have it delivered. Leftovers after your event? No problem, we can return beer
and wine for a credit.  
  
Click here to get in touch!  
  
* * *

* * *

* * *

* * *

440.563.6225 | Cleveland,Ohio © 2023 The Thirst Filly LLC

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media
features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use
of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may
combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve
collected from your use of their services.

garnishes, and an abundance of ice  
Decor & More: We provide all decor pictured in our photos. This includes menu
boards, and fixtures (barrels & dressers)  
 Ingredients : you name it- fresh fruits, herbs, spices, bitters, hand crafted
mixers, infusions, and various add- ons  
Basic Mixers: (Coke, Diet Coke, Tonic, Soda, Cranberry, Juice)  
Soft Drinks & Water: Coke, Diet, Sprite, Ginger Ale / self serve water
decanters  
Alcohol ordering and delivery: We will place your alcohol order and have it
delivered prior to your event.  
Setup and tear down: We show up really early and leave late. We'll never leave
until our chores are done.​  
As environmental conscious business owners we only use napkins, straws and
picks that will decompose in our landfills.
